intent: Added comprehensive unit tests and simplified code
reasoning_trace:
Added 66 unit tests across three modules:

1. models.rs (25 tests):
   - ThoughtObject constructor and builder methods
   - Serialization/deserialization
   - LoreIndex operations (add, get, multiple files)
   - RejectedAlternative struct

2. storage.rs (35 tests):
   - Storage initialization and configuration
   - Index loading/saving
   - Entry save/load/search operations
   - hash_file and hash_string utility functions
   - normalize_path function
   - find_lore_root directory traversal

3. git.rs (16 tests):
   - GitContext opening and discovery
   - Head commit retrieval
   - Changed files detection (new, modified, staged)
   - .lore directory exclusion
   - .gitignore handling
   - ChangeType display and equality

Code simplifications made:
- storage.rs: Refactored get_entries_for_file to use iterator combinators (map, filter_map, unwrap_or_default) reducing 15 lines to 6
- git.rs: Extracted determine_change_type helper method for cleaner separation of concerns, used let-else pattern for clearer control flow

Added tempfile as dev-dependency for test fixtures with temporary directories and git repositories.

rejected_alternatives.name: Integration tests in separate tests/ directory - decided inline tests were sufficient for this codebase size
Mocking git2 library - used real git repos in temp directories for more realistic testing
